text: 42|12|vanankal, pumiyin (pokkisankalin) cavikal avanitame irukkinrana. Avan virumpiyavarkalukku unavai virivakkukiran. (Avan virumpiyavarkalukkuc) curukki vitukiran. Niccayamaka avan cakala vastukkalaiyum (makkalin tanmaikalaiyum) nankarintavan. (Akave, avarkalin takutikkut takkavaru kotukkiran)
